attributes.action: FIX THE AWFUL POTHOLES IN KENT. 100's of us are TOTALLY fed up with them.
attributes.additional_details:
MANY people have had 3 punctures/wheel damage which has amounted to £250 per time when they have hit a pothole. 
This link shows the amount of disgruntled drivers. 
https://m.facebook.com/groups/1985516615056294?view=permalink&id=2024509001157055
We are looking like drunk drivers as we try to swerve potholes now! There will be bad accidents soon..seen near misses as we try avoid thr holes and 'scabbing' where top layer of road surface has worn away. More notice needs to be taken of BAD holes.
attributes.background: Fed up with tyre/wheel damage when travelling in Kent! See this post from online there are MANY fuming drivers who are fed up trying to swerve potholes. We dont feel we are listened to by the Highways Depts https://m.facebook.com/groups/1985516615056294?view=permalink&id=2024509001157055

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
